body:
Utilize the queue names from the collector, as opposed to having them hardcoded.  Includes first draft of the command-line version of the collector.

Here's an example (trimming out all but one CE):

```
{'ce_services': {'AGLT2_CE_2': {'endpoint': 'gate02.grid.umich.edu:9619',
                                'flavour': 'HTCONDOR-CE',
                                'jobmanager': 'condor',
                                'name': 'AGLT2-CE-HTCondorCE-gate02.grid.umich.edu',
                                'site': 'AGLT2',
                                'status': 'Production',
                                'type': 'CE',
                                'version': '2.0.4'}},
 'queues': {'AGLT2_CE_2': {'default': {'ce': 'AGLT2_CE_2',
                                       'entry': 'AGLT2-Dell1g2',
                                       'max_wallclocktime': 4300,
                                       'name': 'default',
                                       'status': 'Production'}}}}
```

(Do not merge until someone from ATLAS ADC gets a chance to chime in on the JSON output.)
title: Overhaul queue generation to actually utilize the queue names
